cause.description:
Visit http://www.twloha.com/the_story to learn more.
1. In Australia, New Zealand and Japan, there are more suicides than murders.
2. Cutting was very much a mystery until 1996 when Princess Diana admitted that she had struggled with it.
3. Self injurers believe pain is their only option, using greater external pain as a relief from the pain inside.
4. There is hope.
cause.mission: TWLOHA is a non-profit movement dedicated to presenting hope and finding help for those struggling with depression, addiction, cutting and suicide.
cause.name: To Write Love On Her Arms
